Title: Those Aren't for Chewing
Description:
I found one of Ponoliak's funerary offerings, mishandled and then discarded by these Shadepaw gnolls... It has bite marks all over it!

This offering, and others like it, are needed for the memorial ceremony for the recently deceased Iskaara chieftain.

It's a travesty that something so sacred should be employed as a chew toy. Please keep an eye out for more offerings.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Hanu at the entrance to Kargpaw's Den in the Big Tree Hills.
RewardText:
<Hanu's nose crinkles.>

Ugh... slathered in slobber.

They will have to suffice for the chieftain's memorial.
